${modID}:CoolingFan.NAME: Cooling Fan
DESCRIPTIONS: Scrying #yStatus cards #yExhausts them.

${modID}:RunicEngine.NAME: Runic Engine
${modID}:RunicEngine.FLAVOR: The runes are indecipherable. But somehow, it still works.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you obtain a Key, choose an #y${modID}:Augment.
NL [#03befc]Combat[] [#03befc]Start[]:
Gain #b9 #yTemp #yHP.
Shuffle #b2 #yMiracle+.
Gain #b3 strength for that turn.
NL [#03befc]Turn[] [#03befc]End[]:
Gain #b1 #yBlock for every #b2 cards in hand.
#yRepair #b1 durability to A random #yEquipment in hand.
Gain #b1 #yStrength. (3 times max)
NL [#03befc]Permanent[]:
Increase maximum hand size by #b2.
Gain [E] at the start of first 2 turns.
Whenever you use the Scry button, Scry #b1 additional card.
When you obtain a Key, choose an #yAugment.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger an #y${modID}:Equipment, gain #b1 #yBlock.

${modID}:MemoryCard.FLAVOR: Ah... I can see into your mind... You like Castlevania. don't you?

${modID}:SecurityCamera.NAME: Security Camera
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you swap your #y${modID}:Target apply #b1 #yVulnerable and #b1 #yWeak.

${modID}:UnceasingBottom.NAME: Unceasing Bottom
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your hand is full during your turn, discard #b1 card.

${modID}:AIFiedHand.NAME: AI-Fied Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower, play the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:NecronomiconPDF.NAME: Necronomicon.pdf
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yCurse, your next #b2 cards are played twice. When you take this relic, become #yCursed.

${modID}:SneckoAI.NAME: Snecko AI
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Start each combat #y${modID}:Hacked.

${modID}:PyramidScheme.NAME: Pyramid Scheme
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your maximum hand size by #b2. At the end of your turn, #yRetain up to #b2 cards.

${modID}:ChemicalY.NAME: Chemical Y
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use the Scry button, Scry #b1 additional card.

${modID}:StrangeFork.NAME: Strange Fork

% chance to not lose Durability.

${modID}:ScheduledUpdate.NAME: Scheduled Update
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn and swap your #yTarget to a random enemy. NL #yChange #yTarget costs #b1 more.
